name: Take My Momentum!
description:
Game Description: Our character has to overcome the weird gravity of its world and watch out for the obstacles to reach the end point. Touching any part of the environment makes you lose your momentum.

This game was developed with using Godot Engine.

Credits: 

  • Hasan Hüseyin Cihangir - Game Developer
  • Kubilay Ege - 2D Artist
  • Senem Aksakal - Game Designer

Press "Space" or "Left Click" to jump.
